      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String colourValidation1(java.lang.String colour)
      colourValidation1 takes in the user entered colour and checks to see if the user entered r b g or y if they do not it sends them around a loop until they input a valid colour
      static java.lang.String colourValidation2(java.lang.String colour, java.lang.String p1colour)
      colourValidation2 takes in the user entered colour and checks to see if the user entered r b g or y and if the previous users entered the same colour .if they not it sends them around a loop until they input a valid colour
      static java.lang.String colourValidation3(java.lang.String colour, java.lang.String p1colour, java.lang.String p2colour)
      colourValidation2 takes in the user entered colour and checks to see if the user entered r b g or y and if the previous users entered the same colour .if they not it sends them around a loop until they input a valid colour

      static int retrivenewBoardsize(int b)
      retrivenewBoardsize checks to see if the boardsize that the user enters is able to be put into an ascetically pleasing board by running it through a for loop and seeing can it be divisable evenly by 10,9,8,7,6 or 5.
      static int retriveXaxis(int b, int x)
      retriveXaxis divides the new board by 10,9,8,7,6 and 5 and then sets the xaxis as the first number that can divide equally by the boardsize
      static int retriveYaxis(int b, int x, int y)
      retrieveYaxis takes in the boardsize and the xaxis and then calculates the yaxis by dividing the boardsize by the xaxis

      • retrivenewBoardsize

        public static int retrivenewBoardsize(int b)
        retrivenewBoardsize checks to see if the boardsize that the user enters is able to be put into an ascetically pleasing board by running it through a for loop and seeing can it be divisable evenly by 10,9,8,7,6 or 5. if it is not dived equally then the program adds one to the boardsize and it goes around the loop again

      • retriveXaxis

        public static int retriveXaxis(int b,
                               int x)
        retriveXaxis divides the new board by 10,9,8,7,6 and 5 and then sets the xaxis as the first number that can divide equally by the boardsize

      • retriveYaxis

        public static int retriveYaxis(int b,
                               int x,
                               int y)
        retrieveYaxis takes in the boardsize and the xaxis and then calculates the yaxis by dividing the boardsize by the xaxis
